explains: n. 索具，绳索；装备，传动装置
wordGroup: drilling rig 钻机，钻探装置
test rig 试验台；试验装置，试验设备
oil rig 石油钻塔，油井设备
rotary drilling rig 旋转钻机
rig up 装配；草草做成

sentences.en: She was accused of corruption, of vote rigging on a massive scale.
sentences.cn: 她被控腐败以及对投票的大规模幕后操纵。

sentences.en: The poll was widely discredited after allegations of ballot rigging.
sentences.cn: 此次投票被指有选举舞弊后被多方质疑。

sentences.en: No one has found one of their canoes or any rigging, which could reveal how the canoes were sailed.
sentences.cn: 没有人发现他们的独木舟或任何索具，而这些东西可以揭示独木舟是如何航行的。
